name: Strange dreams (Revelio studio)
description:
Revelio studio presents : Strange dreams

A video game by Alhussein Ali

The story of the game is about a young man who used to see lucid and strange surreal dreams every night.

controls : 

W A S D - move

mouse -directions + aiming  

space bar -Jump

L Shift + Space bar -sprint 

L ctrl- crouch 

E- interact 

Q- Iron eye 

ESC- Pause

It's my first game I hope you like it and have some fun with it.

made with Unreal Engine 5
